limit-descriptions.exporter-unavailable..zh: 免费版无法使用此项导出
limit-descriptions.exporter-unavailable..en: This exporter is not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.export-limits-exceede.zh: 该项目超出了免费版的限制
limit-descriptions.export-limits-exceede.en: This project exceeds the Free Edition limits

limit-descriptions.event-limits-exceeded.zh: 该项目超出了免费版的限制
limit-descriptions.event-limits-exceeded.en: This project exceeds the Free Edition limits

limit-descriptions.effects-limit.title.zh: 无法继续添加滤镜效果

limit-descriptions.loader-mode.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.remote-preview.title.en: Remote Preview is not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.restricted-plugin.tit.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.event-search.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.find-all-references.t.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.live-preview.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.zorder-bar.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.bookmarks-bar.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.families.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.project-subfolders.ti.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.breakpoints.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.data-editor.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.text-editor.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.webfont-limit.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.bundled-addons.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.onion-skin.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.export-manager.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.generic.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.theme.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.layers-limit.body.zh: 免费版不能添加更多的层数。订阅 Construct3 可解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.layers-limit.body.en: You cannot add more layers in the Free Edition. Purchase a plan to remove all of the Free Edition limits.

limit-descriptions.effects-limit.body.zh: 免费版不能添加更多的滤镜效果。订阅 Construct3 可解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.effects-limit.body.en: You cannot add more effects in the Free Edition. Purchase a plan to remove all of the Free Edition limits.

limit-descriptions.remote-preview.body.zh: 远程预览功能可以让你在不同设备方便快速地预览项目。这对于在移动设备上试测试游戏特别有帮助。订阅 Construct3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.remote-preview.body.en: Remote Preview allows you to quickly and easily test your project on different devices. It's particularly useful for trying out your project on mobile devices. Purchase a plan to access this feature.

limit-descriptions.find-all-references.b.zh: [i]查找所有引用[/i]可以立即查找整个项目中所有引用了该内容的事件列表，非常适合检索内容和重构。订阅 Construct3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.find-all-references.b.en: [i]Find All References[/i] allows you to instantly see a list of everywhere something is used in your project. It's great for reviewing your work. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.live-preview.body.zh: [i]实时预览[/i]可以在编辑器中即时查看对象行为的预览效果，无需运行项目。这对于一些视觉效果，特别是调试粒子和滤镜非常有帮助。订阅 Construct3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.live-preview.body.en: [i]Live Preview[/i] allows you to see a preview of an object or behavior directly in the editor, without having to preview the project. It's great for getting effects right, such as with the Particles object. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.zorder-bar.body.zh: 层级栏可以轻松调整对象的显示顺序，排列对象显示在其他对象上方或底部。订阅 Construct3 可解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.zorder-bar.body.en: The Z Order Bar allows you to easily edit which objects appear in front or behind others. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.bookmarks-bar.body.zh: 书签栏可以收藏事件表中某个位置，并在它们之间轻松导航。订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.bookmarks-bar.body.en: The Bookmarks Bar allows you to save locations in event sheets and easily navigate between them. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.families.body.zh: [i]家族功能[/i]可以有效消除对象的重复事件。订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.families.body.en: [i]Families[/i] help eliminate repeated events for similar objects. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.project-subfolders.bo.zh: 在项目栏中创建子文件夹，帮助您进行项目管理，使整个项目变得井井有条。订阅Construct 3可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.project-subfolders.bo.en: Using subfolders in the Project Bar helps you keep your project organized. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.breakpoints.body.zh: 使用调试模式预览时，可以让事件在断点处暂停运行。订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.breakpoints.body.en: Breakpoints allow you to pause on an event when using the debugger. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.data-editor.body.zh: 数据可视化编辑器允许你更直观地编辑数组和字典数据。订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.data-editor.body.en: The data editors allow you to edit Array and Dictionary data directly in the editor. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.text-editor.body.zh: 文本编辑器允许您在编辑器中直接编辑文本文件，订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.text-editor.body.en: The text editor allows you to edit text files directly in the editor. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.webfont-limit.body.zh: 免费版不能添加更多的Web字体。订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.webfont-limit.body.en: You cannot add more Web Fonts in the Free Edition. Purchase a plan to remove all of the Free Edition limits.

limit-descriptions.bundled-addons.body.zh: 将第三方插件捆绑在项目文件中，允许您在任何地方打开此项目，无需提前安装必要的插件。订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.bundled-addons.body.en: Bundling addons with a project allows you to open the project anywhere without having to first install the addons it uses. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.onion-skin.body.zh: 透明洋葱皮背景允许您在动画编辑器中，方便地查看上一帧和下一帧的半透明图层，这对于绘制帧动画非常有帮助。订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.onion-skin.body.en: Onion skinning allows you to see translucent copies of the next and previous frames while editing the current animation frame. It's a great help for drawing animations. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.timeline-limit.body.zh: 免费版最多可添加1个时间轴对象，且时长不超过5秒。订阅 Construct3 可解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.timeline-limit.body.en: You cannot have more than one timeline, or a timeline longer than 5 seconds, in the Free Edition. Purchase a plan to remove all of the Free Edition limits.

limit-descriptions.script-limit.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.script-limit.body.zh: 免费版不能添加更多的脚本。订阅 Construct3 可解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.script-limit.body.en: You cannot write more JavaScript in the Free Edition. Purchase a plan to remove all of the Free Edition limits.

limit-descriptions.custom-ease-function-.zh: 免费版不能添加更多的曲线。订阅 Construct3 可解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.custom-ease-function-.en: You cannot have more than one custom ease function, in the Free Edition. Purchase a plan to remove all of the Free Edition limits.

limit-descriptions.mesh-editor-limit.bod.zh: 免费版不能添加更多的纹理网格。订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.mesh-editor-limit.bod.en: You cannot edit more than one mesh in a project in the Free Edition. Purchase a plan to remove all of the Free Edition limits.

limit-descriptions.export-limits-exceede.zh: 当前项目使用的[b]{0}[/b]超出了免费版限制，您将无法继续导出项目。订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.export-limits-exceede.en: This project exceeds the Free Edition limit for [b]{0}[/b]. You cannot export this project when the limits are exceeded. Purchase a plan to remove all of the Free Edition limits.

limit-descriptions.event-limits-exceeded.zh: 当前项目使用的[b]{0}[/b]超出了免费版限制，您将无法继续修改此项目。订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.event-limits-exceeded.en: This project exceeds the Free Edition limit for [b]{0}[/b]. You cannot modify this project when the limits are exceeded. Purchase a plan to remove all of the Free Edition limits.

limit-descriptions.export-image-sequence.zh: 达到导出图像切图的数量限制
免费版不能导出超过 5 秒的图像切图。订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.export-image-sequence.en: You cannot export an image sequence longer than 5 seconds in the Free Edition. Purchase a plan to remove all of the Free Edition limits.

limit-descriptions.exporter-unavailable..zh: Construct 提供了一系列方便快捷的导出选项，以帮助您将项目发布到不同的平台运行。订阅 Construct 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.exporter-unavailable..en: Purchase a plan to use the full features of Construct, including a range of new export options to help you publish your project to different platforms.

limit-descriptions.loader-mode.body.zh: 免费版不提供更改启动页加载样式。只能使用带有 Construct 标志的标准样式。订阅 Construct3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.loader-mode.body.en: The loader setting cannot be changed in the Free Edition. You can only export projects using the Construct splash. Purchase a plan to remove all of the Free Edition limits.

limit-descriptions.restricted-plugin.bod.zh: 免费版不提供这项功能。订阅 Construct 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.restricted-plugin.bod.en: This plugin is not available in the Free Edition. Purchase a plan to access all plugins in Construct.

limit-descriptions.export-manager.body.zh: 免费版不提供这项功能。导出管理器允许您管理和重新下载 Construct 的导出项目，以及导出从 Construct 2 输出的导出项目。订阅 Construct 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.export-manager.body.en: The Export Manager allows you to review and build the last few exports from Construct, as well as build projects exported from Construct 2. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.theme.body.zh: 免费版不提供这项功能。主题允许您自定义 Construct 编辑器的外观，例如使用深色主题。订阅 Construct 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.theme.body.en: Changing the theme allows you to customise the appearance of Construct, such as by using a dark theme. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.export-video-limit.bo.zh: 免费版不能导出超过 5 秒的视频。订阅 Construct 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.export-video-limit.bo.en: You cannot export a video or GIF longer than 5 seconds in the Free Edition. Purchase a plan to remove all of the Free Edition limits.

limit-descriptions.generic.body.zh: 免费版不提供这项功能。订阅 Construct 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.generic.body.en: This feature is not available in the Free Edition of Construct. Purchase a plan to start using it.

limit-descriptions.event-search.body.zh: 免费版不提供内容搜索功能。订阅 Construct 3 可以解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.event-search.body.en: Searching event sheets and project files is not available in the Free Edition. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

limit-descriptions.minify-script.title.en: Not available in the Free Edition

limit-descriptions.minify-script.body.zh: 混淆代码可以帮助压缩项目的 Javascript 文件，让项目更难被逆向工程，同时也有助于减少需下载的文件大小，改善首次加载时间。订阅计划解锁完整功能。
limit-descriptions.minify-script.body.en: Minifying script reduces the size of the exported JavaScript code, making the project quicker to load and harder to reverse engineer. Purchase a plan to use this feature.

login-tip.zh: 如果你已经是订阅用户，请[a1]登陆账号[/a1]使用完整功能。
login-tip.en: If you've already purchased a plan, [a1]log in to your account[/a1] to use the full features.
